title: Ba Min Jingling Duo Bao Ji
synopsis: Seven brave and witty little elves live in the land of Bamin, guarding the peace and harmony of the people. King Fengyu, who was suppressed in Qixing Cave of Taimu Mountain, tried to break through the blockade and sent his men to use typhoons, floods, and plagues to harm the land of Bamin. At the critical juncture, "Elves of Bamin Stone-Danxia Brother" and "Elves of Bamin Tea-Chazai" hurried to Pingnan Baishuiyang, Fuzhou Sanfang Qixiang, Xiamen Gulangyu, Zhangpu Volcanic Island, Nanjing Yunshuiyao, Yongding Tulou and other places in Bamin, contact other Bamin elves to gather in Taima Mountain, and gather with the power of "Bamin Happiness Magic Weapon" to stop the conspiracy and tricks of the Fengyu King (translated from iqiyi)
